name: Tu, Neis!
description:
Shitpost of a shity gamejam theme    :D

Created By Julio Stehling Vieira Martins and Lucas Augusto Reis Martins

(We're not relatives)

Controls:

SHIFT - attack

W /  Up arrow - move up

A / Left arrow- move left

S / Down arrow - move down

D / Right arrow - move right
